author: fwyzard
body:
- update CUDA to version 8.0.61.
  - update nvidia drivers to version 375.26
  - fixed upstream:
Profiling applications using `nvprof` or Visual Profiler on systems without an NVIDIA driver resulted in an error. This is now reported as a warning.
  - fix the CMSSW installation of `nvvp` and `nsight`.
title: Update CUDA to version 8.0.61
